content.html: Lots of companies have names for folks who work there. Weird thing to pick out. Especially since a lot of the folks impacted would refer to themselves as that. Of all the shitty parts of this you picked out the one that attacks the people laid off. Rethink maybe.
content.value:
Lots of companies have names for folks who work there. Weird thing to pick out. Especially since a lot of the folks impacted would refer to themselves as that. 

Of all the shitty parts of this you picked out the one that attacks the people laid off. Rethink maybe.
